name: Iceworm
movement: walk 20 ft., burrow 30 ft., swim 20 ft.
description: The Iceworm is a small, slippery monstrosity adapted to cold environments, featuring a streamlined body capable of burrowing and swimming through icy terrain.
memorable: Its icy attacks can hinder opponents significantly, coating them in freezing slime that reduces their speed.
goals: Typically seeks warmth and food, utilizing its sense to locate warm-blooded creatures.
relations: May be found in colonies with similar cold-adapted monsters or other aquatic creatures.
environment: Cold environments, such as icy waters or snowy landscapes.
strengths: Agile movement and ability to inflict cold damage; advantageous in icy terrains.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire and extreme heat, which affects its combat abilities.
attacks: Icy Bite delivers piercing and cold damage, while Icy Spit reduces the enemy's speed and accuracy.
most_powerful_ability: Cold Physiology makes it vulnerable to exhaustion in warmer temperatures, yet it has an advantage on escape attempts due to its slippery nature.
senses: Blindsight up to 90 feet and tremorsense up to 30 feet enhance its ability to locate prey in icy conditions.
skills: Perception at -1 reflects its average awareness in combat situations.
additional_information: Has disadvantage on attack rolls near sources of strong heat.
Can detect warm-blooded creatures within 90 feet.
Slippery ability aids in escaping grapples.
test_queries: ice creature with slippery escape abilities
amphibious monster native to icy environments
creature that uses cold attacks and hinders foes
nimble worm-like monster with cold sensitivities
